For details see accompanying license terms. */

/** * AttributeToggler toggles an attribute of the selected figures between two * different values. * If the name of a compatible JTextComponent action is specified, the toggler * checks if the current permant focus owner is a JTextComponent, and if it is, * it will apply the text action to the JTextComponent. * * @author Werner Randelshofer * @version 4.0 2006-06-07 Reworked. *
3.0 2006-02-27 Support for compatible text action added. *
2.0 2006-02-27 Toggle attributes regardles from action state. *
1.0 27. November 2003 Created. */
